property.content:
{{velocity output=none}} ## ## Initialize common variables and services ## #macro(initializeCommonVariables) #set ($debuglogger = $services.logging.getLogger('BookVersions.NavigationMenu')) #set ($docRef = $doc.getDocumentReference()) #set ($collectionRef = $services.bookversions.getVersionedCollectionReference($docRef)) #set ($isVersionedPage = $services.bookversions.isVersionedPage($docRef)) #set ($isVersionedContent = $services.bookversions.isVersionedContent($docRef)) #set ($isUnversionedPage = $services.bookversions.isPage($docRef) && !$services.bookversions.isVersionedPage($docRef)) #set ($isPublishedPage = $xwiki.getDocument($collectionRef).getObject('BookVersions.Code.PublishedBookClass') != $NULL) #set ($contentRef = $services.model.resolveDocument($services.model.serialize($docRef.getParent(),'local'))) #set ($isUnexistingContent = !$xwiki.exists($doc) && $services.bookversions.isPossibleVersionedContentReference($collectionRef,$contentRef)) #set ($bookRef = $services.model.resolveDocument($services.model.serialize($collectionRef,'local'))) #end ## ## Initialize version-related variables ## #macro(initializeVersionVariables) #set ($selectedVersion = $services.bookversions.getSelectedVersion($collectionRef)) #set ($versions = $services.bookversions.getCollectionVersions($collectionRef)) #set ($inheritedRedirFlag = $request.getSession().getAttribute('BookVersions.versionInheritedRedirFlag')) #end ## ## Initialize variant-related variables ## #macro(initializeVariantVariables) #set ($variants = $services.bookversions.getCollectionVariants($collectionRef)) #if (!$selectedVariant) #set ($selectedVariant = $services.bookversions.getSelectedVariant($collectionRef)) #end #if (!$selectedVariant && ($isVersionedPage || $isUnversionedPage) && $variants.size() > 0) #set ($discard = $services.bookversions.setSelectedVariant($collectionRef, "")) #end #set ($selectedVariant = $services.bookversions.getSelectedVariant($collectionRef)) #end ## ## Initialize language-related variables ## #macro(initializeLanguageVariables) #set ($languagesRef = $services.model.resolveDocument('Languages', $bookRef.parent)) #set ($languagesDoc = $xwiki.getDocument("${languagesRef}.WebHome")) #set ($languagesObj = $languagesDoc.getObject('BookVersions.Code.MultilingualClass')) #if ($languagesObj) #set ($multilingualEnabled = $languagesObj.getProperty('enabled').getValue()) #set ($languages = $languagesObj.getProperty('supportedLanguages').getValue()) #elseif ($isPublishedPage) #set ($languages = $xwiki.getDocument($collectionRef).getObject('BookVersions.Code.PublishedBookClass').getValue('languages')) #else #set ($languages = []) #end #set ($selectedLanguage = $services.bookversions.getSelectedLanguage($collectionRef)) #end ## ## Handle language selection from request ## #macro(handleLanguageSelection) #if ($request.selectedLanguage) #set ($newLanguage = $request.selectedLanguage) $services.bookversions.setSelectedLanguage($collectionRef, $newLanguage) #set ($selectedLanguage = $newLanguage) $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($doc, $xcontext.action)) #end #end ## ## Setup language display variables ## #macro(setupLanguageDisplay) #set ($languageStatusInfoMsg = '') #set ($languageStatusTooltip = '') #if ("$!selectedLanguage" != '') #set ($macro.isDefaultLanguage = $services.bookversions.isDefaultLanguage($docRef, $selectedLanguage)) #if ($macro.isDefaultLanguage) #set ($languageInfoMsg = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.languageDefaultSelected', [$selectedLanguage])) #set ($languageTooltip = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.languageSelect.tooltip.languageDefaultSelected', [$selectedLanguage])) #else #set ($languageInfoMsg = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.languageSelected', [$selectedLanguage])) #set ($languageTooltip = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.languageSelect.tooltip.languageSelected', [$selectedLanguage])) #end #set ($macro.translationStatus = $services.bookversions.getTranslationStatus($docRef, $selectedLanguage)) #if("$!macro.translationStatus" != '') #set ($languageStatusInfoMsg = $services.localization.render("BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.${macro.translationStatus}")) #set ($languageStatusTooltip = $services.localization.render("BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.tooltip.${macro.translationStatus}")) #end #else #set ($languageInfoMsg = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.noLanguageSelected')) #set ($languageTooltip = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.languageSelect.tooltip.noLanguageSelected')) #end #end ## ## Handle variant actions (link/unlink) ## #macro(handleVariantActions) #if ("$!request.variantAction" != '') #set ($variantsObj = $doc.getObject("BookVersions.Code.VariantsListClass", true)) #set ($associatedVariants = $variantsObj.getProperty('variantsList').getValue()) #set ($selectedVariant = "$!request.selectedVariant") #if ($selectedVariant != '') #if ($request.variantAction == 'link' && !$associatedVariants.contains($selectedVariant)) #if(!$associatedVariants) #set ($associatedVariants = []) #end $associatedVariants.add($selectedVariant) $variantsObj.set('variantsList', $associatedVariants) $doc.save('Added variant association') #elseif ($request.variantAction == 'unlink' && $associatedVariants.contains($selectedVariant)) $associatedVariants.remove($selectedVariant) #if ($associatedVariants.size() > 0) $variantsObj.set('variantsList', $associatedVariants) #else $doc.removeObject($variantsObj) #end $doc.save('Removed variant association') #end #end #end #end ## ## Handle variant selection from request ## #macro(handleVariantSelection) #if ($request.selectedVariant) #set ($newVariant = $request.selectedVariant) $services.bookversions.setSelectedVariant($collectionRef, $newVariant) #set ($selectedVariant = $newVariant) $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($doc, $xcontext.action)) #end #end ## ## Handle version selection and redirections ## #macro(handleVersionSelection) #if ($versions.size() > 0) #if (!$selectedVersion) #handleNoSelectedVersion() #elseif ($isUnexistingContent && !$request.r) #handleUnexistingContent() #elseif ($isVersionedPage && !$isVersionedContent) #handleVersionedPageRedirection() #else #handleContentPageDisplay() #end #end #end ## ## Handle case when no version is selected ## #macro(handleNoSelectedVersion) $debuglogger.debug("Handle case when no version is selected") #set ($selectedVersion = $versions.get(0)) #if ($selectedVersion) $services.bookversions.setSelectedVersion($collectionRef, $selectedVersion) #set ($discard = $debuglogger.debug("No selected version yet. Set the most recent [$selectedVersion]")) #end #set ($discard = $request.getSession().setAttribute('BookVersions.versionInheritedRedirFlag',true)) #set ($versionedContentReference = $services.bookversions.getInheritedContentReference($docRef, $selectedVersion)) #set ($discard = $debuglogger.debug("Redirect to corresponding content [$versionedContentReference]")) $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($versionedContentReference, $xcontext.action)) #end ## ## Handle unexisting content case ## #macro(handleUnexistingContent) $debuglogger.debug("Handle unexisting content case") #set ($contentRef = $services.model.resolveDocument($services.model.serialize($docRef.getParent(),'local'))) #set ($versionRef = $services.bookversions.getVersionReference($collectionRef,$contentRef.getName())) #set ($versionedContentReference = $services.bookversions.getVersionedContentReference($contentRef, $services.model.serialize($versionRef))) #if ($versionedContentReference) $services.bookversions.setSelectedVersion($collectionRef, $services.model.serialize($versionRef,'local')) #set ($discard = $debuglogger.debug("No selected version yet. Set to [$versionRef]")) #end #set ($discard = $request.getSession().setAttribute('BookVersions.versionInheritedRedirFlag',true)) #set ($inheritedVersionedContentReference = $services.bookversions.getInheritedContentReference($contentRef, $versionRef)) #handleUnexistingContentRedirection($inheritedVersionedContentReference) #end ## ## Handle redirection for unexisting content ## #macro(handleUnexistingContentRedirection $inheritedVersionedContentReference) #if ($inheritedVersionedContentReference) #set ($discard = $debuglogger.debug("Redirect to: $inheritedVersionedContentReference")) $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($inheritedVersionedContentReference, $xcontext.action)) #elseif($isVersionedContent) $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($inheritedVersionedContentReference, $xcontext.action, 'r=0')) #else #handleParentRedirection() #end #end ## ## Handle parent page redirection ## #macro(handleParentRedirection) #set($parentReference = $docRef.getParent()) #set($isParentVersionedPage = $services.bookversions.isVersionedPage($parentReference)) #if(!$isParentVersionedPage && $docRef.getLastSpaceReference() && $docRef.getLastSpaceReference().getParent()) #set($parentReference = $docRef.getLastSpaceReference().getParent()) #set($isParentVersionedPage = $services.bookversions.isVersionedPage($parentReference)) #end #if($isParentVersionedPage) #set ($versionedContentReference = $services.bookversions.getVersionedContentReference($parentReference, $services.model.serialize($selectedVersion))) $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($parentReference)) #end #end ## ## Handle versioned page redirection ## #macro(handleVersionedPageRedirection) #set ($discard = $debuglogger.debug('Page is a top page (versioned page but not content)')) #set ($versionedContentReference = $services.bookversions.getVersionedContentReference($docRef, $selectedVersion)) #if ($versionedContentReference && $xwiki.exists($versionedContentReference)) #set ($discard = $debuglogger.debug("Redirect to version content selected: $versionedContentReference")) #if("$!{request.viewer}" == '' && "$!{request.xpage}" == '') $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($versionedContentReference, $xcontext.action)) #end #else #handleInheritedContent() #end #end ## ## Handle inherited content ## #macro(handleInheritedContent) #set ($discard = $debuglogger.debug('No version to inherit from, starting with [{}]. Searching further.', $selectedVersion)) #if (!$selectedVersion) #set ($selectedVersion = $versions.get(0)) #end #if ($selectedVersion) #set ($inheritedVersionedContentReference = $services.bookversions.getInheritedContentReference($docRef, $services.model.resolveDocument($selectedVersion))) #if ($inheritedVersionedContentReference) $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($inheritedVersionedContentReference, $xcontext.action)) #end #else #set ($discard = $debuglogger.debug('Found NO versioned content for page[{}]', ${docRef})) #set ($displaySpecialWarning = true) ## Should not happen (I wasn't able to end in this case because if no version is available we just don't ) !! {{warning}} No version available {{/warning}} #end #end ## ## Handle content page display ## #macro(handleContentPageDisplay) #set ($discard = $debuglogger.debug('Content page to be displayed')) #if ($inheritedRedirFlag) #set ($discard = $debuglogger.debug('Page reached through inheritance, selectedVersion stays untouched')) #set ($discard = $request.getSession().setAttribute('BookVersions.versionInheritedRedirFlag',false)) #elseif ("$!selectedVersion" != '') ## THIS SHOULD PROBABLY NOT BE CALLED ##handleSelectedVersionUpdate() #end #end ## ## Update selected version ## #macro(handleSelectedVersionUpdate) #set ($currentVersionedContentName = $docRef.getName()) #if ($currentVersionedContentName == 'WebHome') #set ($currentVersionedContentName = $docRef.getParent().getName()) #end #set ($versionReference = $services.bookversions.getVersionReference($collectionRef, $currentVersionedContentName)) #set ($selectedVersion = $services.model.serialize($versionReference, 'local')) #if ($selectedVersion) ## $services.bookversions.setSelectedVersion($collectionRef, $selectedVersion) ## #set ($discard = $debuglogger.debug('Set selectedVersion from current page: [{}]', $selectedVersion)) #end #end ## ## Render the version and variant selectors ## #macro(renderSelectors) #if ($isVersionedContent || $isVersionedPage || $isUnversionedPage || $isPublishedPage) #setupVersionDisplay() #setupVariantDisplay() #setupLanguageDisplay() #renderSelectorsHTML() #end #end ## ## Setup version display variables ## #macro(setupVersionDisplay) #set ($currentDocName = $docRef.getName()) #set ($selectedVersionName = $services.bookversions.getVersionName($services.model.resolveDocument($selectedVersion))) #set ($selectVersionInfoMsg = '') #set ($selectedVersionTitle = '') #set ($selectedVersionToolip = '') #if ($isUnversionedPage) ## Unversioned page #set ($selectVersionInfoMsg = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.hint', [$services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.unversioned')])) #set ($selectedVersionToolip = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.tooltip.noVersion')) #else ## Versioned page #set ($versionTitle = $xwiki.getDocument($services.bookversions.getVersionReference($collectionRef,$docRef.getName())).displayTitle) #set ($selectedVersionTitle = $xwiki.getDocument($services.bookversions.getVersionReference($collectionRef,$selectedVersionName)).displayTitle) ## #if ($versionTitle) #set ($selectVersionInfoMsg = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.hint', [$versionTitle])) #if ($versionTitle == $selectedVersionTitle) #set ($selectedVersionToolip = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.tooltip.versionned', [$versionTitle])) #else #set ($selectedVersionToolip = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.tooltip.inherited', [$selectedVersionTitle, $versionTitle])) #end #else #set ($selectVersionInfoMsg = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.hint', [$services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.noContent')])) #set($selectedVersionToolip = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect.tooltip.noContent', [$selectedVersionTitle])) #set($displaySpecialWarning = true) #end #end #end ## ## Setup variant display variables ## #macro(setupVariantDisplay) #set ($variantsObj = $doc.getObject("BookVersions.Code.VariantsListClass")) #set ($associatedVariants = []) #set ($associatedVariantsTitle = []) #if ($variantsObj) #set ($associatedVariants = $variantsObj.getProperty('variantsList').getValue()) #end #set ($selectedVariantName = "") #set ($variantTitle = "") #set ($msgAssociateVariantName = "") #if("$!selectedVariant" != "") #set ($selectedVariantName = $services.bookversions.getVariantName($services.model.resolveDocument($selectedVariant))) #set ($variantTitle = $xwiki.getDocument($services.bookversions.getVariantReference($collectionRef,$selectedVariantName)).displayTitle) #if ($associatedVariants && $associatedVariants.size() > 0 && $associatedVariants.contains($selectedVariant)) #set ($msgAssociateVariantName = "unlink") #else #set ($msgAssociateVariantName = "link") #end #end #if ($associatedVariants && $associatedVariants.size() > 0 ) #foreach($assocVariant in $associatedVariants) #set ($assocVariantTitle = $services.bookversions.getVariantName($services.model.resolveDocument($assocVariant))) #set ($ok = $associatedVariantsTitle.add($assocVariantTitle)) #end #set($associatedVariantsTitleS = $stringtool.join($associatedVariantsTitle, " ")) #set ($variantInfoMsg = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.pageRestrictedTo', [$associatedVariantsTitleS])) #set ($variantTooltip = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.variantSelect.tooltip.restricted', [$associatedVariantsTitleS])) #else #set ($variantInfoMsg = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.pageIsNotAssociated')) #if("$!selectedVariant" != "") #set ($variantTooltip = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.variantSelect.tooltip.notAssociatedVariantSelect', [$variantTitle])) #else #set ($variantTooltip = $services.localization.render('BookVersions.navMenu.variantSelect.tooltip.notAssociatedNoVariantSelected')) #end #end #end ## ## Render the HTML for selectors ## #macro(renderSelectorsHTML) {{html}}
#if ($versions.size() > 0) #renderVersionSelector() #end #if ($variants.size() > 0) #renderVariantSelector() #end #if ($languages.size() > 0) #renderLanguageSelector() #end #if ($isVersionedContent || $isUnversionedPage) #displayStatusProperty() #end
{{/html}} #end ## ## Render version selector HTML ## #macro(renderVersionSelector)

$escapetool.xml($selectVersionInfoMsg)

#end ## ## Render variant selector HTML ## #macro(renderVariantSelector)

$escapetool.xml($variantInfoMsg)

#end ## ## Display status property ## #macro(displayStatusProperty) #set ($xobject = $doc.getObject('BookVersions.Code.PageStatusClass')) #set ($statusProp = $xobject.getProperty('status').getPropertyClass()) #set ($xclass = $xobject.xWikiClass) #set ($discard = $doc.use($xobject)) #set ($editing = $xcontext.action == 'edit')
#set ($propertyId = "${xclass.name}_${xobject.number}_$statusProp.name") $escapetool.xml($statusProp.translatedPrettyName)
$doc.display($statusProp.name)
#end ## ## Render language selector HTML ## #macro(renderLanguageSelector) #if ($multilingualEnabled == 1 && $languages.size() > 0)

$escapetool.xml($languageInfoMsg)

$escapetool.xml($languageStatusInfoMsg)

#end #end {{/velocity}} {{velocity}} ## ## Main execution flow ## ## Do nothing if not in the view action #if ($xcontext.action != 'view') #stop #end ## Initialize all required variables #initializeCommonVariables() #initializeVersionVariables() #initializeVariantVariables() #initializeLanguageVariables() ## #set ($discard = $debuglogger.debug("START Navigation menu for [$docRef], inheritedRedirFlag [$inheritedRedirFlag], collectionRef [$collectionRef], isVersionedPage [$isVersionedPage], isVersionedContent [$isVersionedContent], isUnversionedPage [$isUnversionedPage], isUnexistingContent [$isUnexistingContent]")) ## ## Handle variant and language-related actions #handleVariantActions() #handleVariantSelection() #handleLanguageSelection() ## ## Process version selection and handle redirections if needed #if ("$!collectionRef" != '' && ($versions.size() > 0 || $variants.size() > 0 || $isPublishedPage) && ($isVersionedPage || $isVersionedContent || $isUnexistingContent || $isUnversionedPage || $isPublishedPage)) #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('BookVersions.Code.NavigationMenu')) #set ($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('BookVersions.Code.NavigationMenu')) ## #handleVersionSelection() #renderSelectors() #end #if($displaySpecialWarning) {{warning}} $services.localization.render('BookVersion.pageSheet.nocontent') {{/warning}} #end {{/velocity}}
